predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, the U.S. Department of Justice will file a remedies proposal in the Google Search antitrust case that seeks to prohibit Google from paying for default search placement on browsers or devices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if a filing appears on the court docket in U.S. et al. v. Google LLC (Search) or via a DOJ press release that explicitly includes a prohibition on default-search payment agreements with browser/device partners.
evidence: Google liability ruling increases likelihood of prompt remedies phase and behavioral prohibitions on default-deal payments.
monitoring_signals: Court scheduling orders and deadlines in the Google case
DOJ press statements or leaks on remedy scope
Reports about Google-Apple default search arrangements
Analogous behavioral remedies proposed in prior tech antitrust cases
predictions.rationale: Liability finding heightens pressure for behavioral remedies; default-payment bans are a natural focus.

predictions.text: The LBMA Gold Price PM will fix at or above $2,650/oz on at least two trading days by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count days with LBMA Gold Price PM fixes ≥ $2,650/oz using ICE Benchmark Administration/LBMA published data up to 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Fed cut probabilities and real yields (TIPS)
USD index (DXY) moves
Central bank gold purchases and ETF flows
Escalation in geopolitical risks or trade uncertainty
predictions.rationale: Falling real yields and policy uncertainty support further highs after recent records.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or below 3.95% on at least one trading day by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmed via FRED series DGS10 daily close ≤ 3.95% on any trading day through 2025-09-30.
monitoring_signals: Core CPI/PCE prints and labor data surprises
FOMC guidance and SEP projections
Auction demand (bid-to-cover, tail) for UST 10Y
Risk sentiment and term premium estimates
predictions.rationale: Cooling labor demand and growing cut odds favor a dip in long yields.

predictions.text: At Apple’s September 9, 2025 event, the U.S. starting price for the base iPhone 16 Pro will be announced as at least $1,099.
predictions.verification_criteria: Apple event materials or Apple Newsroom press releases list iPhone 16 Pro starting U.S. MSRP ≥ $1,099.
evidence: Historically higher component costs and feature upgrades have supported occasional Pro-tier price increases.
monitoring_signals: Pre-event supply chain and BOM cost reports
Tariff and trade policy developments impacting iPhone costs
Apple margin guidance and channel checks
Leaked pricing from carrier partners
predictions.rationale: Cost pressures and positioning of Pro models increase odds of a price floor at $1,099.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas futures will settle at or above €40.00/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check official daily settlement prices for ICE Endex TTF front-month; success if any settle ≥ €40.00/MWh by 2025-10-31.
evidence: Seasonal Norwegian maintenance and LNG supply variability can tighten near-term balances.
Early heating season weather and storage withdrawals often elevate volatility.
monitoring_signals: Norwegian and UKCS outage reports
European gas storage levels vs 5-year norms
LNG send-out rates and U.S. export facility uptime
Weather forecasts (HDDs) and industrial demand
predictions.rationale: Seasonal risks and supply hiccups can briefly lift front-month TTF above €40.

predictions.text: NOAA’s Space Weather Prediction Center will issue at least one G3 (Strong) geomagnetic storm watch or warning by 2025-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmed via SWPC Alerts, Watches and Warnings archive showing a G3 Watch or G3 Warning issued between now and 2025-10-31 (UTC).
evidence: Solar Cycle 25 is near peak, elevating probabilities of strong storms.
monitoring_signals: Emergence of large active regions and sunspot counts
Halo CME detections and WSA–Enlil model outputs
Kp forecasts and solar wind parameters (Bz, speed) from DSCOVR
predictions.rationale: Solar maximum conditions raise odds of at least a G3-level event in coming weeks.

predictions.text: U.S. CPI-U core m/m (seasonally adjusted) for August 2025 will be at or below 0.3%, as reported by BLS on 2025-09-11.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS CPI news release shows monthly percent change for All items less food and energy (core CPI) for Aug 2025 ≤ 0.3%.
monitoring_signals: High-frequency rent indices and OER trends
Used car auction prices and airfare
Medical services and core goods price trackers
Dollar strength and import prices
predictions.rationale: Cooling labor demand and goods disinflation should cap core at 0.3%.
